sn18.10:4.2: “What do you think, Rāhula? Is form permanent or impermanent?”
sn18.10:4.9: “Seeing this, a learned noble disciple becomes disillusioned with form,
sn18.10:4.16: When freed, they know ‘it is freed’.
sn18.10:4.17: They understand: ‘Rebirth is ended, the spiritual life has been lived, what had to be done has been done, there is no return to any state of existence.’”
